headline: Head & Shoulders Launches New Upgraded Collections With Tailored Formulas for Unique Scalp and Hair Types
summary: CINCINNATI, February 10, 2026--Head & Shoulders, the world's #1 anti-dandruff shampoo, announces the launch of three newly upgraded collections, featuring expertly formulated shampoos and conditioners designed to address the unique needs of every scalp and hair type.

headline: Reassessing Procter & Gamble (PG) After Recent Share Price Recovery
summary: If you are wondering whether Procter & Gamble's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone in asking what you are really paying for with PG today. The stock last closed at US$157.33, with returns of 2.7% over the past 7 days, 10.9% over the last 30 days, 11.0% year to date, and a 3.5% decline over the past year, alongside gains of 21.3% over 3 years and 39.9% over 5 years.
